original_text: Then Joshua put the kings to death and exposed their bodies on five poles, and they were left hanging on the poles until evening.
korean_text: 그 후에 여호수아가 그 왕들을 쳐죽여 다섯 나무에 매달고 저녁까지 나무에 달린 채로 두었다가

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua put the kings to death
and exposed their bodies on five poles
and they were left hanging on the poles
